Design for beginners

Master the basics of designing data for your maps!

  • Lesson 1

    Getting Started with Map Design

  • Lesson 2

    Colors. Truth & Insights

  • Lesson 3

    Invisible and Visible Data

  • Lesson 4

    Placing Your Labels

What youâ€™ll learn

In this lesson, you will start learning the basics of design with data and maps. You will begin to explore map design by learning about the use of colors, data, and labels. When you finish the course, you will have developed a set of tools that you can use in any map visualization.

Prerequesites

  • Reliable internet access

  • A modern browser like Chrome, Firefox, or Safari

  • Basic CartoDB knowledge

  • Completion of Course 1

  • DIFFICULTY
    basic
  • TIME
    2 hours
